definition: (classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: Thus, before the property management of residence turned off the valve, my grandmother's house was flooded.
sentences.chinese: 於是乎，在物業把總閥門關掉之前，姥姥家發大水了。

sentences.english: And , somehow or other , loveliness is infernally sad .
sentences.chinese: 於是乎，可愛竟令人感到有些許可憎的悲傷。

sentences.english: So, again, the technology is still being used.
sentences.chinese: 於是乎，這項技術還在應用。

sentences.english: So, I dreamed myself was standing in the Ta Kuan Garden this morning.
sentences.chinese: 於是乎，今早就很自然的夢到了自己站在大觀園裏。

sentences.english: I resolved to travel to the island of Barbados .
sentences.chinese: 我於是乎下定決心去巴貝多島旅行。

sentences.english: Thus, wood so and hurriedly will chilly float in the sky to hand over as his invitation card.
sentences.chinese: 於是乎，林偌趕緊將寒飛揚給他的帖子交出。

sentences.english: And people continue to pour across the border by the hundreds every day.
sentences.chinese: 於是乎，每天仍然有成百上千的人跨國邊界湧入南非。

sentences.english: And he began to bow to the Buddhas and study the Buddhadharma.
sentences.chinese: 於是乎，他也開始拜佛，研究佛法了。

sentences.english: The first percussion instrument was born.
sentences.chinese: 於是乎，第一個打擊樂器誕生了。

definition: a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
imperial concubine or palace maid/imperial secretary (old)
to engulf/to bury/to overlook/to stifle/to neglect/to fall into oblivion
